description:
Soft shell cross-country skiing pants that raises the bar in the "environmentally friendly" category. Thermore® synthetic insulation blocks wind and offers protection from the elements. Stretch panels provide mobility to keep you striding around the ski track longer.

  • Wind- and water-resistant softshell with Bionic Finish Eco® (a natura flourine-free hydrophobic finish)
  • Main fabric, lining and insulation uses 100% recycled materials
  • Stretch panels and articulated legs offer a range of movement
  • Thermore® Ecodown insulation provides warmth and resist moisture
  • Brushed interior adds warmth and is soft against the skin
  • Polyurethane membrane acts as a barrier while allowing moisture to escape
  • Reflective details for enhanced visibility in low light
name: B Daehlie Aware Pants - Women's
